radiographic_examinations.findings: A right frontal, parasagittal, ovoid, peripherally enhancing mass lesion, measuring 5 cm at its maximum dimension, solid in the medial component with a thin rim of enhancement due to cystic change, considerable surrounding white matter edema, and approximately 1 cm of midline shift to the left.

A heterogeneous intraaxial 5-cm mass within the right frontal lobe, displaying a low signal on T1-weighted MR images and a mixed signal on T2-weighted MR images, with increased vascularity indicated by prominent flow voids, and a thick irregular ring enhancing lesion.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scans of the chest and abdomen
radiographic_examinations.findings: A mediastinal soft-tissue mass measuring 2 cm in diameter just below the thoracic inlet and adjacent to the right trachea, a liver lesion measuring 3.5 x 5.8 cm in segments 4b and 5, and an extrahepatic lymph node mass measuring 5 cm.
Evidence of metastatic foci involving the posterior elements of T-7, the left 10th rib, the right seventh rib, and the neck of the left femur.
